original_text: For the earth shall be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
korean_text: 이는 물이 바다를 덮음 같이 여호와의 영광을 인정하는 것이 세상에 가득함이니라

sentences.original_text: For the earth shall be filled
with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord
as the waters cover the sea
